subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The University of Pittsburgh receiver Derek Kinder, a first-team all-Big East player last season, will miss this season with a torn knee ligament. He was injured making a cut after catching a pass during a noncontact drill Saturday during the first day of full-squad workouts.
